body_html: @vrv In the majority of the cases (like this one) seems that your are following this merging process. This alter the github pulse and other stats. Is there a way in your process to let this PRs result as merged?

body: @vrv In the majority of the cases (like this one) seems that your are following [this merging process](http://stackoverflow.com/questions/23015168/how-to-close-a-github-pull-request-with-a-commit-comment). This alter the github pulse and other stats. Is there a way in your process to let this PRs result as merged?
